title: Implement Postgres + S3 store APIs
description:

- add_source(): Insert source record in Postgres with collection/tags/status
- store_artifact(): Upload raw/extracted/manifest to S3 with {env}/{collection}/{source_id}/{kind} key convention

- search(): Hybrid retrieval combining pgvector cosine similarity + FTS with weighted merge (0.7 semantic, 0.3 keyword)
